actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for daylight saving time from the first Sunday in March to the last Sunday in October.

summary.text: Provides for daylight savings time from the first Sunday in March to the last Sunday in October. Repeals the Emergency Daylight Savings Time Energy Conservation Act of 1973.

titles.title: A bill to provide for daylight saving time from the first Sunday in March to the last Sunday in October.
